column13: Medibank's Live Better vans are mobile health clinics designed to bring essential services and support to rural communities directly. By travelling to remote areas, these vans ensure that rural customers can access healthcare resources, promoting wellness and improving health outcomes.
column20: Live Better vans,mobile health clinics, rural communities

column6: Operations with local community engagement, impact assessments, and development programs
column13: Medibank's Feel Good Grants program provides funding and support to community initiatives promoting health and wellbeing. Through this program, Medibank empowers organisations to implement projects that positively impact individuals' physical and mental wellness, fostering happier and healthier communities.
column20: Feel Good Grants program, health and wellbeing program, Australian Human Resources Institute

column6: Operations with local community engagement, impact assessments, and development programs
column13: Medibank encourages blood and plasma donation as part of its commitment to community health and wellbeing. By supporting these initiatives, Medibank helps ensure that vital resources are available to those in need, contributing to society's overall health and safety.

column6: Operations with local community engagement, impact assessments, and development programs

column6: Operations with local community engagement, impact assessments, and development programs
column8: Australian and New Zealand College Collaboration
column13: Medibank collaborates with the Australian and New Zealand College of Anaesthetists Foundation in a comprehensive longitudinal study investigating the incidence of chronic pain and its economic ramifications following surgical procedures. Through this partnership, extensive research is conducted to understand the prevalence of post-surgical chronic pain and assess its broader economic impact, ultimately contributing to improved pain management strategies and healthcare policies.
column20: Australian and New Zealand College, Anaesthetists Foundation, longitudinal study

column6: Operations with local community engagement, impact assessments, and development programs
column13: Medibank collaborated with the Royal Australian College of General Practitioners to introduce a $250,000 grant dedicated to supporting research in digital health within primary care settings. Additionally, in partnership with the Breakthrough Mental Health Foundation, we are working to enhance the mental health and wellbeing of Indigenous Australian children through an educational program implemented within schools.
column20: Royal Australian College, General Practitioners, digital health in primary care

column6: Operations with local community engagement, impact assessments, and development programs
